select c.id,u.id userId,IFNULL(u.userName,c.name) userName,c.createTime,c.ipAddress from clock c left join user u on u.photo = c.photo
and u.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and DATE_FORMAT(c.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{searchTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(c.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') order by createTime

select ul.userId,cl.level,d.startTime,d.endTime from userlevel ul LEFT JOIN clocklevel cl on ul.levelId = cl.id LEFT JOIN dimension d on d.parentId = cl.id where ul.userId = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
